verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. Because in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \add and\add* brought to \w silence|strong="H1820"\w*; because in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \add and\add* brought to \w silence|strong="H1820"\w*;\f + \fr 15.1 \ft brought…: or, cut off\f*

He is gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Bajith|strong="H1006"\w*, and to \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, to \w weep|strong="H1065"\w*: \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* over \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, and over \w Medeba|strong="H4311"\w*: on all their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \add shall be\add* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w*, \add and\add* every \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w*.

In their \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* they shall \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* themselves with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*: on the \w tops|strong="H1406"\w* of their houses, and in their \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*, every one shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H3381"\w*.\f + \fr 15.3 \ft weeping…: Heb. descending into weeping, or, coming down with weeping\f*

And \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, and \w Elealeh|strong="H0500"\w*: their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shall be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add even\add* unto \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*: therefore the armed \w soldiers|strong="H2502"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall cry \w out|strong="H7321"\w*; his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w grievous|strong="H3415"\w* unto him.

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall cry \w out|strong="H2199"\w* for \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; his \w fugitives|strong="H1280"\w* \add shall flee\add* unto \w Zoar|strong="H6820"\w*, an \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* of three years \w old|strong="H7992"\w*: for by the mounting \w up|strong="H4608"\w* of \w Luhith|strong="H3872"\w* with \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* shall they go it \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Horonaim|strong="H2773"\w* they shall raise \w up|strong="H5782"\w* a \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* of \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.\f + \fr 15.5 \ft his…: or, to the borders thereof, even to Zoar, as an heifer\f*\f + \fr 15.5 \ft destruction: Heb. breaking\f*

For the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Nimrim|strong="H5249"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H4923"\w*: for the \w hay|strong="H2682"\w* is withered \w away|strong="H3001"\w*, the \w grass|strong="H1877"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3615"\w*, there is no green \w thing|strong="H3418"\w*.\f + \fr 15.6 \ft desolate: Heb. desolations\f*

Therefore the \w abundance|strong="H3502"\w* they have \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w*, and that which they have laid \w up|strong="H6486"\w*, shall they carry \w away|strong="H5375"\w* to the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* of the \w willows|strong="H6155"\w*.\f + \fr 15.7 \ft brook…: or, valley of the Arabians\f*

For the \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* is gone round \w about|strong="H5362"\w* the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; the \w howling|strong="H3215"\w* thereof unto \w Eglaim|strong="H0097"\w*, and the \w howling|strong="H3215"\w* thereof unto \w Beer-elim|strong="H0879"\w*.

For the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Dimon|strong="H1775"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: for I will \w bring|strong="H7896"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* upon \w Dimon|strong="H1775"\w*, \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* upon him that \w escapeth|strong="H6413"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and upon the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.\f + \fr 15.9 \ft more: Heb. additions\f*
